Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I'm a medical (university level) student from Manchester in the UK. Hobbies include computers/electronics and got to hear about KSP from a friend who studies Computer Science.

I've been playing the demo version for nearly a week, then bought the full version on Steam a couple of days ago - I think it's fantastic!!

Just managed to put a satellite around Mun - so happy right now!

Next task is docking! (I've been told this is really hard to get the first few times)

HI DeliriousJ! Good to hear you are catching on pretty quick! You heard right, docking is one of the most difficult things for beginners to master. If you are patient and take your time, you'll be a pro and before you know it, you will dock without having to really think about it at all. I made a great walkthrough tutorial for docking it's in my sig. It's helped many others achieve their first dock! Good luck and happy flying!
